org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.properties

Class ProjectProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.properties.ProjectProperties

  • public class ProjectProperties
extends Object
    Class used to manage the properties of the project (file stored in ~/.remediation/config.properties) which can be modified to change the params used in the whole application
    Author:
    Francois -Xavier Aguessy
